plot: A singer is reinventing jazz music, but after being dumped by his girlfriend loses the creative inspiration. He will fight in a musical duel to get back his beloved.
title: Limerence
plot_es: A singer is reinventing jazz music, but after being dumped by his girlfriend loses the creative inspiration. He will fight in a musical duel to get back his beloved.
plot_en: A singer is reinventing jazz music, but after being dumped by his girlfriend loses the creative inspiration. He will fight in a musical duel to get back his beloved.
